basics.name: Naga Jyothi
basics.label: Trainer cum Developer
basics.summary: Richard hails from Tulsa. He has earned degrees from the University of Oklahoma and Stanford. (Go Sooners and Cardinal!) Before starting Pied Piper, he worked for Hooli as a part time software developer. While his work focuses on applied information theory, mostly optimizing lossless compression schema of both the length-limited and adaptive variants, his non-work interests range widely, everything from quantum computing to chaos theory. He could tell you about it, but THAT would NOT be a “length-limited” conversation!
basics.achievements: Merit Certificate (1st prize)| Technical event: CYBRUS &# 39 17 at Siddartha Institute of Science and Technology | Tirupathi  |4th April 2017.
basics.workshops: Workshop on Android App Development | Technophobia Systems | Sri Sai Institute of Technology and Science | 27th & 28th October 2014.
seminar: AppleTalk is a network os designed to connect Apple Computers. Its components are built on Macintosh operating systems. This mechanism uses of CSMA/CA a media access control method.  And AppleShare is used as the file and print sharing protocol on AppleTalk networks.
basics.declaration: I do here by declare that the particulars of information and facts stated here and above are true and complete to the best of my knowledge and belief.

work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scores™ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
